hints.content: The $\goldD{A}$ is at $\redD1{:}{\blueE{40}}$ because it is located $\blueE{40}$ ticks after $\redD1{:}{00}$.

On a clock, $\redD1{:}{00} $ looks like this:

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 1. The long minute hand points to 12. Labels outside the edge of the clock are number 1 through 12. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/485f89cacc5c57ac3f80916ece9755fbf0cacaab)

And just like on the number line, $1{:}{\blueE{40}}$ is $\blueE{40}$ ticks after $1{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is halfway between 1 and 2. The long minute hand points to 8. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c6020e52d3d31c8626202fb1ec77afc1863e12ae)

This clock shows $1{:}{40}$.

![A clock shows the short hour hand is halfway between 1 and 2. The long minute hand points to 8.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f3f2267a63e152db5b75979365c16297a898f92c)

question.content:
**Which clock matches the time shown on the number line?**

![The number line showing minute marks goes from 1:00 to 2:00 with labels every 15 minutes. Point A is labeled at 10 minutes past the 1:30 label.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/cd33ad1b3949f2e0eb3b2f6320e3c83e6a6d9e9c)

choices.content: ![A clock shows the short hour hand is halfway between 1 and 2. The long minute hand points to 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0e1ac8003470314ad7922dbb673bda6f81765c7a)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is halfway between 1 and 2. The long minute hand points to 4.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8c1f3033af49b152fa8144d90daf4673ecb996b0)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is halfway between 1 and 2. The long minute hand points to 8.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f3f2267a63e152db5b75979365c16297a898f92c)
